name: serverless-log-forwarding
description: a serverless plugin to forward logs to given lambda function

scripts.test: node ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --recusrive ./test/unit-tests/ -- -R spec && node ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js check-coverage --line 70 coverage/coverage.json
scripts.integration-test: node ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --recusrive ./test/integration-tests/ -- -R spec && node ./node_modules/istanbul/lib/cli.js check-coverage --line 70 coverage/coverage.json

author: Amplify Education
